Reference

Fake datasets

These functions access datasets.

data_fake_county

Fake data for mortality in Norway

data_fake_nation

Fake data for mortality in Norway nationally

data_fake_nowcasting_aggregated

Cleaned fake data for mortalityregistration

data_fake_nowcasting_county_aggregated

Cleaned fake data for mortality registration on a county basis

data_fake_nowcasting_county_raw

Fake data for mortalityregistration

Nowcasting

Nowcasting, baseline and evaluation functions

baseline_est()

Baseline estimator.

nowcast()

Nowcast, corrigation of data

nowcast_aggregate()

Aggregation of data for nowcasting

nowcast_correction_fn_negbin_mm()

Nowcast correction function using the negative binomial distribution.

nowcast_correction_fn_quasipoisson()

Nowcast correction function using the quasipoisson distribution.

nowcast_correction_sim_neg_bin()

Nowcast simmulation function when nowcast_correction_fn_negbin is used for correction.

nowcast_correction_sim_quasipoisson()

Nowcast simmulation function when nowcast_correction_fn_quasipoisson is used for correction.

nowcast_eval()

Evaluation of the nowcast performance.

Attributable mortality

Functions for estimating attributable mortality

est_attrib()

Estimates simulations of expected responses

fit_attrib()

Data fit

sim()

Generates simulations of expected mortality by simulating the model coefficients.
